# excludeQuickDrawElementsIconCreationOption

**Type Property**

An option to suppress generation of the QuickDraw format icon representations that are used in macOS 10.0 through macOS 10.4.

## Declaration

```swift
static var excludeQuickDrawElementsIconCreationOption: NSWorkspace.IconCreationOptions { get }
```

## Creation Options

- **exclude10_4ElementsIconCreationOption**: An option to suppress generation of the new higher resolution icon representations that are supported in macOS 10.4.

items.description: An option to suppress generation of the new higher resolution icon representations that are supported in macOS 10.4.
